definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to see for oneself/to see with one's own eyes

sentences.english: His denial that he had witnessed the accident dumbfounded me.
sentences.chinese: 他否認曾親眼目睹這一事故的發生把我驚呆了。

sentences.english: Your eyes are pools in Heshbon, by the gate of Bath-rabbim.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼目像希實本巴特那拉並門旁的水池。

sentences.english: If Haiti, you'll witness the the ugly side Western paternalism.
sentences.chinese: 而在海地，你會親眼目睹到西方家長作風的醜陋面。

sentences.english: When a king sits on his throne to judge, he winnows out all evil with his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 王坐在審判的位上，以眼目驅散諸惡。

sentences.english: There is a generation, O how lofty are their eyes! and their eyelids are lifted up.
sentences.chinese: 有一宗人，眼目何其高傲，眼皮也是高舉。

sentences.english: He witnessed in person the murder.
sentences.chinese: 他親眼目睹了這場謀殺。

sentences.english: He shutteth his eyes to devise froward things: moving his lips he bringeth evil to pass.
sentences.chinese: 眼目緊合的，圖謀乖僻，嘴脣緊閉的，成就邪惡。

sentences.english: Against whom have you raised your voice and lifted your eyes in pride?
sentences.chinese: 揚起聲來，高舉眼目攻擊誰呢？

sentences.english: Presents and gifts blind the eyes of judges, and make them dumb in the mouth, so that they cannot correct.
sentences.chinese: 贈品與禮物昏迷明智人的眼目，就如口罩阻止責斥。

sentences.english: Recently I witnessed a men's doubles game between players with a fairly high skill level.
sentences.chinese: 最近親眼目睹了一場較高水平的男子雙打比賽。

sentences.english: Fans would undoubtedly flock to arenas to witness it all in person.
sentences.chinese: 球迷們毫無疑問將湧向球館親眼目睹球星的風采。

sentences.english: Your eyes are the pools of Heshbon by the gate of Bath Rabbim.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼目像希實本，巴特拉並門旁的水池。

sentences.english: This week you can see the Galilean satellites for yourself.
sentences.chinese: 本週，您能親眼目睹加利略衛星。

sentences.english: Now Ahijah could not see, for his eyes were dim because of his age.
sentences.chinese: 亞希雅因年紀老邁，眼目發直，不能看見。

sentences.english: The commands of the Lord are radiant, giving light to the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的命令清潔，能明亮人的眼目。

definition: to dazzle/to brighten up (a room etc)
to dazzle/to blink at/to open one's eyes wide
to radiate/to shine/glitter of light/a glint
